txt.en: 'That flame you found must be the source of the power that has called these drowned spirits forth from the waters of the Greyflood. If you wish to banish them, the flame itself must be extinguished.'
Tell Hithriel that the flame has been extinguished
With the flame extinguished, you should return to the mission giver and tell them of your findings.
'It is a relief to know that this kindling of evil has been extinguished by your hand. I thank you for your brave efforts.'
'You are ready to set out? Stay on your guard. It is likely that the most dreadful of wraiths will be drawn to the flame itself.'
Speak with the mission giver and let them know you are ready to complete your mission in the Greyflood.
There is no twist in this mission.
Complete the Mission: The Accursed Flame
An accursed flame burns in the ruins at the edge of the Greyflood. It must be doused if the spirits it has drawn to these waters are to be banished.
